Cherrycake\Modules\Validate::email

Validates the given email address

    Signature

    public function email(string $email, [boolean $forceMethod = false, [boolean $isFallbackToSimpleMethod = true]] )

    Parameters

    $email — string
    The email address to validate
    $forceMethod — boolean
    If specified, this email validation method will be used instead of the configured one. One of the available VALIDATE_EMAIL_METHOD_
    $isFallbackToSimpleMethod — boolean
    Whether to use the VALIDATE_EMAIL_METHOD_SIMPLE method if the configured or forced method is not available

    Returns

    array
    A result array where the first element is a boolean indicating whether the operation has gone ok or not, and the second element is a hash array of additional information.
